# Courage (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* | [[Arvoreen]], [[Bahgtru]], Berna, [[Clangeddin Silverbeard]], [[Gaerdal Ironhand]], [[Heironeous]], [[Ilneval]], [[Kord]], [[Llerg]], [[Nomog-Geaya]], [[Norebo]], Valkar, Yondalla |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Power:** You radiate an aura of courage that grants all allies within 10 feet (including yourself) a +4 morale bonus on saving throws against fear effects. This supernatural ability functions while you are conscious, but not if you are unconscious or dead.

**Courage Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Remove Fear (Spell)|Remove Fear]]****:** Suppresses fear or gives +4 on saves against fear for one subject + one per four levels.

**2** **[[Aid (Spell)|Aid]]****:** +1 on attack rolls and saves against fear, 1d8 temporary hp +1/level (max. +10).

**3** **[[Cloak of Bravery (Spell)|Cloak of Bravery]]****:** You and your allies gain a bonus on saves against fear.

**4** **[[Heroism (Spell)|Heroism]]****:** Gives +2 bonus on attack rolls, saves, skill checks.

**5 [[Valiant Fury (Spell)|Valiant Fury]]:** +4 Str, Con; +2 Will saves; extra attack; cures 1d8 hp +1/level (max. +20).

**6** **[[Heroes' Feast (Spell)|Heroes’ Feast]]****:** Food for one creature/level cures and grants combat bonuses.

**7** **[[Heroism, Greater (Spell)|Heroism, Greater]]****:** Gives +4 bonus on attack rolls, saves, skill checks; immunity to fear; temporary hp.

**8** **[[Lion's Roar (Spell)|Lion’s Roar]]****:** Deals 1d8 points of damage per two levels to enemies; allies get +1 on attacks and saves against fear, plus temporary hp.

**9** **[[Cloak of Bravery, Greater (Spell)|Cloak of Bravery, Greater]]****:** You and your allies become immune to fear and get +2 bonus on attacks.


| **Source:** | Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 272 |
|---|---|
| | Complete Warrior (WotC), pg. 114 |
